page.title: 19BMX Bicycles.
page.content: BMX riding is one of the latest and most expensive children's crazes of our time. A BMX bicycle is built more strongly than its conventional counterpart in order to sustain the extra stress and strain put upon it. One of the stunts a skilful rider can perform is to lift the front wheel clear of the ground and pedal along on the rear wheel only. Similarly it is possible to rock the machine from front to rear wheel; balancing the machine on each wheel for several seconds. This is done without the usual forward motion necessary to keep an ordinary bicycle in balance. The wheels of BMX bikes are moulded out of metal alloy, thus combining strength with lightness. The spoked wheel of an ordinary road bicycle would buckle and collapse if the above stunts were tried on it.
